Class ContentItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kenticocloud.delivery.ContentItem

  • public class ContentItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Object model description of a single content item object.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String codeName)
        Convenience method to get the value of a Text or Rich text element without traversing the Elements map.
        Parameters:
        codeName - the element codeName to get the value of
        Returns:
        The value of the element. Returns null if the element does not exist, or if it is not a TextElement or RichTextElement

      • getAssets

        public java.util.List<Asset> getAssets(java.lang.String codeName)
        Convenience method to get the value of an Assets element without traversing the Elements map.
        Parameters:
        codeName - the element codeName to get the Asset list of
        Returns:
        A list of Asset objects. Returns an empty collection if the element does not exist, or if it is not an AssetsElement

      • getModularContent

        public ContentItem getModularContent(java.lang.String codeName)
        Convenience method to retrieve the ContentItem of modular content.
        Parameters:
        codeName - the ContentItem codeName
        Returns:
        The ContentItem. Returns null if it was not included in the response.

      • castTo

        public <T> T castTo(java.lang.Class<T> tClass)
        Returns a new instance of T by mapping fields to elements in this content item. Element fields are mapped by automatically CamelCasing and checking for equality, unless otherwise annotated by an ElementMapping annotation. T must have a default constructor and have standard setter methods. When passing in Object.class, the type returned will be an instance of the class registered with the DeliveryClient that is annotated with ContentItemMapping that matches the contentType of this ContentItem (however still returned as type Object).
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of class
        Parameters:
        tClass - The class which a new instance should be returned from
        Returns:
        An instance of T with data mapped from the ContentItem in this response.

      • castToDefault

        public java.lang.Object castToDefault()
        Returns a new instance by mapping fields to elements in this content item. Element fields are mapped by automatically CamelCasing and checking for equality, unless otherwise annotated by an ElementMapping annotation. The type returned will be an instance of the class registered with the DeliveryClient that is annotated with ContentItemMapping that matches the contentType of this ContentItem (however still returned as type Object).
        Returns:
        An instance with data mapped from the ContentItem in this response.
        See Also:
        castTo(Class)

      • castTo

        public java.lang.Object castTo(java.lang.String contentType)
        Returns a new instance by mapping fields to elements in this content item. Element fields are mapped by automatically CamelCasing and checking for equality, unless otherwise annotated by an ElementMapping annotation. The type returned will be an instance of the class registered with the DeliveryClient that that matches the contentType provided.
        Parameters:
        contentType - The contentType to match this ContentItem too.
        Returns:
        An instance with data mapped from the ContentItem in this response.
